id: 17 Celeb Physical Interactions That I Will Never, Ever Get Over
paragraph:
Celebs' physical interactions are something else.
        i could watch this on loop for eonsLAST NIGHT @KeshaRose found out @JerrySeinfeld is not a #Hugger -- Is it hard to be a non-hugger in 2017?BuzzFeed HomeSitemap© 2018 BuzzFeed, Inc.
